alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 29 at 7:16PM PDT until November 01 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph possible in the windiest passes and canyons early Monday morning. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
